title: An Act to amend the definition of hate crime

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Creem, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1056) of Cynthia Stone Creem and Michael J. Barrett for legislation to amend the definition of hate crime.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
